org.springdata.cassandra.cql.core
Interface AdminCqlOperations

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultAdminCqlOperations
public interface AdminCqlOperations

Operations for managing a Cassandra keyspace.

Author:
Alex Shvid, David Webb, Matthew T. Adams
